description: African-American woman born and raised in Albuquerque. She has spent the majority of her working career as a nurse. After going to the New Mexico Workforce Connection Center, she is now currently pursuing a one month nursing certification program.
quote: All you gotta do is claim it. Claim it and it's yours. And a lot of people don't. They're just like, ‘Oh, I don't think I can do that job’ so they bypass it.
